kw.name: Create Session

kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=booksAPI, url=https://fakerestapi.azurewebsites.net, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Directory
kw.msg: Directory 'C:\Users\User\Desktop\dojo - automation api\content-type=application\json' already exists.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://fakerestapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/Books path_url=/api/v1/Books headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '167', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"id": "787799", "title": "Livro do Denzel", "description": "My Nigga", "pageCount": "123", "excerpt": "voluptate sunt est", "publishDate": "2021-12-17T09:39:01.228Z"}'
